requirements.summary: Add a reproducible, manual-export helper that outputs every file under frontend/src/components/** one-by-one with exact relative paths and unchanged contents (and nothing else).
acceptanceCriteria: All files and subfolders under `frontend/src/components` are included (e.g., `auth/*`, `layout/*`, `projects/*`, `screenplay/*`).
Each file is output with its full path (starting at `frontend/src/components/...`) and complete, unmodified content.
No files outside `frontend/src/components` are included in this batch.
Output is organized so a developer can reconstruct the folder locally with the same structure.

file_operations.description: Create a Node/TS helper script that recursively walks `frontend/src/components/**`, reads each file as-is, and prints a deterministic, file-by-file export to stdout that includes each fileâ€™s full relative path (starting at `frontend/src/components/...`) followed by the complete, unmodified file contents; ensure it includes subfolders (e.g., auth/layout/projects/screenplay) and excludes anything outside `frontend/src/components`.

Document how to run the manual export helper, what its output format looks like (path + full contents per file), and guardrails to ensure only `frontend/src/components/**` is included (no hooks/lib/backend/public/root files).
